About Us

We are a student-run organization at UBCO, dedicated to advancing knowledge and skills in aerospace engineering. Our club brings together passionate students to design, build, and launch UAVs and rockets.

UAV Team

Focused on drones and fixed-wing aircraft, this team works on autonomous flight, aerodynamics, and control systems.

Rocketry Team

Dedicated to amateur rocketry projects, from small-scale launches to high-power rocketry competitions.

Join Us

Interested in aerospace engineering, rocketry, or drones? We welcome students of all backgrounds and skill levels.
